com.outbrain.aletheia

Class DatumEnvelopeStreamsBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.outbrain.aletheia.DatumEnvelopeStreamsBuilder

  • public class DatumEnvelopeStreamsBuilder
extends Object
    Provides a fluent API for building a DatumConsumerStream for consuming DatumEnvelopes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DatumEnvelopeStreamsBuilder.EnvelopeTimestampSelector
      A DatumType.TimestampSelector which extracts a timestamp from a DatumEnvelope.

        Returns:

      • createBuilder

        public static DatumEnvelopeStreamsBuilder createBuilder(AletheiaConfig config,
                                                        String endpointId)
        Create an instance of a DatumEnvelopeStreamsBuilder. This is the main entry point for working with the DatumEnvelopeStreamsBuilder.
        Parameters:
        config - An instance of AletheiaConfig.
        endpointId - The Id of a ConsumptionEndPoint to consume DatumEnvelopes from.
        Returns:
        A DatumEnvelopeStreamsBuilder instance.

      • registerBreadcrumbsEndpointType

        public <TProductionEndPoint extends ProductionEndPoint,UProductionEndPoint extends TProductionEndPoint> DatumEnvelopeStreamsBuilder registerBreadcrumbsEndpointType(Class<TProductionEndPoint> endPointType,
                                                                                                                                                                    DatumEnvelopeSenderFactory<? super UProductionEndPoint> datumEnvelopeSenderFactory)
        Registers a ProductionEndPoint type for producing Breadcrumbs
        Parameters:
        endPointType - The type of the custom endpoint to register.
        datumEnvelopeSenderFactory - A DatumEnvelopeSenderFactory capable of building 's from the specified endpoint type.
        Returns:
        A DatumEnvelopeStreamsBuilder instance with the custom production endpoint registered.

      • registerConsumptionEndPointType

        public <TConsumptionEndPoint extends ConsumptionEndPoint,UConsumptionEndPoint extends TConsumptionEndPoint> DatumEnvelopeStreamsBuilder registerConsumptionEndPointType(Class<TConsumptionEndPoint> consumptionEndPointType,
                                                                                                                                                                        DatumEnvelopeFetcherFactory<? super UConsumptionEndPoint> datumEnvelopeFetcherFactory)
        Registers a ConsumptionEndPoint type. After the registration, data can be consumed from an instance of this endpoint type.
        Parameters:
        consumptionEndPointType - The consumption endpoint to add.
        datumEnvelopeFetcherFactory - A DatumEnvelopeFetcherFactory capable of building DatumEnvelopeFetchers from the specified endpoint type.
        Returns:
        A DatumEnvelopeStreamsBuilder instance capable of consuming data from the specified consumption endpoint type.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
